intro_text: Your patrol comes across a mouse
fail_text: Your patrol narrowly misses the mouse

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a large rat
success_text: Your patrol catches the rat! More freshkill!
fail_text: Your patrol misses the rat, and their confidence is shaken

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a large hare
fail_text: Your patrol narrowly misses the hare

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a bird
success_text: Your patrol catches the bird before it flies away!
fail_text: Your patrol narrowly misses the bird

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a squirrel
fail_text: Your patrol narrowly misses the squirrel

intro_text: Your patrol sees the shadow of a fish in a river
success_text: r_c hooks the fish out of the water! More freshkill!
fail_text: Your patrol accidentally scares the fish away

intro_text: r_c spots a rabbit up ahead but it seems to be acting strange
success_text: r_c catches the rabbit and it is eaten as normal
fail_text: r_c catches the rabbit and later the cats who eat it become violently ill
decline_text: r_c avoids catching the rabbit and looks for other prey

intro_text: The patrol approaches a Twoleg nest while hunting
success_text: The patrol has a successful hunt, avoiding any Twolegs
fail_text: Twoleg kits scare the patrol away
decline_text: The patrol decides to hunt elsewhere
